attributes.action: parliament cannot over rule or suppress the result of a referendum
attributes.background: The obvious attempts by certain MP's to divert the will of the people

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200165
